info.title: ApplicationInsightsManagementClient
info.description: Azure Application Insights client for selecting pricing plans and options.

get.description: Returns the current pricing plan setting for an Application Insights component.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

parameters.name: resourceName
parameters.description: The name of the Application Insights component resource.

200.description: An Application Insights component pricing plan definition.

put.description: Replace current pricing plan for an Application Insights component.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

parameters.name: resourceName
parameters.description: The name of the Application Insights component resource.

requestBody.description: Properties that need to be specified to update current pricing plan for an Application Insights component.

200.description: Successful request when updating billing features for an Application Insights component. The updated current billing features are returned.

patch.description: Update current pricing plan for an Application Insights component.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

parameters.name: resourceName
parameters.description: The name of the Application Insights component resource.

requestBody.description: Properties that need to be specified to update current pricing plan for an Application Insights component.

200.description: Successful request when updating billing features for an Application Insights component. The updated current billing features are returned.

ApplicationInsightsComponentPricingPlan.description: An Application Insights component pricing plan

cap.description: Daily data volume cap in GB.

maxHistoryCap.description: Maximum daily data volume cap that the user can set for this component.

resetHour.description: Daily data volume cap UTC reset hour.

stopSendNotificationWhenHitCap.description: Do not send a notification email when the daily data volume cap is met.

PricingPlanProperties.description: An Application Insights component daily data volume cap

ResourceNameParameter.name: resourceName
ResourceNameParameter.description: The name of the Application Insights component resource.
